means: 积累，积聚( amass的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: How had he amassed his fortune?
sentence.Network_cn: 他是如何积累财富的呢？

sentence.Network_en: He amassed a fortune from silver mining.
sentence.Network_cn: 他靠开采银矿积累了一笔财富。

sentence.Network_en: They have amassed a fortune in just a few years.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在几年的时间里就聚集了一笔财富.

PerfectNetExp.abs: They amassed huge wealth by plundering the colonies ., 他们通过掠夺殖民地聚敛了大笔的财富.
He amassed his papers for burning ., 他把文件集拢来烧毁.

very few pirates ever amassed such a fortune that it needed to be buried when it could be far better employed in the taverns and brothels of the Caribbean or America .很少有海盗会认为他们积累的财宝需要被埋藏起来，将它们花费在加勒比海和美洲的酒馆和妓院里会更有用处。

list.abs: for years , a hodgepodge network of seed banks has been amassing seed and shoot collections in a haphazard manner . labs in Mexico banked corn species . those in Nigeria banked cassava .多年来，很多庞杂的种子库网络一直以随意的方式收集种子和苗芽：墨西哥的实验室收藏玉米种，尼日利亚的实验室收藏木薯种。
蓄 amass\HALT \VERB, amassment \NOUN蓄水 water amassment蓄水证 water amassment pattern
[amass wealth] 聚敛财物专务裒敛详细解释聚敛搜括。《陈书·侯安都传》:“受脤专征,剽掠一逞,推毂所镇,裒敛无厌。”宋梅尧臣《依韵吴冲卿<秋虫>》.
amalgamate 合并amassing knowledge 积累的知识amend 修正

entry.def: If you amass something such as money or information, you gradually get a lot of it.

example.ex: How had he amassed his fortune?
example.tran: 他是如何积累财富的呢？

means.word_mean: 1. brought together into a group or crowd;

auth_sentence.content: He has amassed a lot of out-of-the-way knowledge.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has amassed a lot of out-of-the-way knowledge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has amassed a lot of out-of-the-way knowledge.

auth_sentence.content: Resources and medical personnel were amassed nearby.
auth_sentence.res_content: Resources and medical personnel were amassed nearby.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Resources and medical personnel were amassed nearby.

auth_sentence.content: Those who amassed power by purging others ended up getting purged.
auth_sentence.res_content: Those who amassed power by purging others ended up getting purged.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those who amassed power by purging others ended up getting purged.
